title: download-url stalls while downloading a simple URL

labels.name: severity-important
labels.description: major effect on the usability of a package, without rendering it completely unusable to everyone

body:
Triggered by trying to reproduce #4525 , but resulted in a different discovery I believe: for me it just stalled!

<details>
<summary>With this simple reproduction script:</summary> 

```shell
$> cat test-ziprchive.sh                        
#!/bin/bash
#
#

export PS4="> "
set -eu
cd "$(mktemp -d ${TMPDIR:-/tmp}/dl-XXXXXXX)"

which datalad
datalad --version

set -x
datalad create ds
(
cd ds
datalad download-url --archive http://www.onerussian.com/tmp/testzip.zip
)
```
</details>

if ran with DATALAD_LOG_LEVEL=1 the last lines I see are
```
[DEBUG  ] Reading files: ['/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/crawdad.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/crcns.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/figshare.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/hcp.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/indi.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/kaggle.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/loris.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/nda.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/nitrc.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/openfmri.cfg', '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-0.12.x/datalad/downloaders/configs/providers.cfg', '/home/yoh/.config/datalad/providers/www.onerussian.com.cfg', '/home/yoh/.config/datalad/providers/jigsaw.w3.org.cfg', '/home/yoh/.config/datalad/providers/w3-digest.cfg', '/home/yoh/.config/datalad/providers/jigsaw-digest.cfg', '/home/yoh/.config/datalad/providers/my.domain.com.cfg', '/home/yoh/.config/datalad/providers/yarik.cfg'] 
[DEBUG  ] Assigning credentials into 25 providers 
[DEBUG  ] Initializing default provider for http 
[DEBUG  ] No dedicated provider, returning default one for http: Provider(authenticator=None, credential=None, name='', url_res=['http://.*']) 
[Level 5] Requested to provide version for requests 
[INFO   ] Downloading 'http://www.onerussian.com/tmp/testzip.zip' into '/home/yoh/.tmp/dl-xoRowDy/ds/' 
```
and there it stays!  requests library is at 2.23.0
